title: I NEED 6 RP FOR THE BLOOD MOON ICON.
body:
Hey Riot I kind of need 6 rp to get the blood moon icon. So I heard that people can get little amounts of RP by showing pictures of their artwork. My drawing isn't that good but whatever. :) Enjoy a drawing of High Noon {{champion:157}} and {{champion:134}}  my favorite champions in the game. THANKS!

http://m.imgur.com/KZ3BFmG

replies.body: You should send that awesome drawing to support, along with a note explaining what you need. A 'please' couldn't hurt either. :3

Give the man his damn RP, these are the feild of "Justice" after all.

Regards,

Basic.
I love what you did with the paper, it looks like an actual faded poster from the past.
That's actually pretty much worth it! lol
